      • check

        public void check()
        Checks all the 4 walls for expansion

      • checkTop

        private void checkTop()
        This method checks the top wall if an alive cell is registered then expand the top with one rows of dead cells. Add rows horizontal for the first 5 rows.

      • checkLeft

        private void checkLeft()
        This method checks the left wall and will expand the array if there are living cells on the edge
